snippet.title: Robot Tank for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
One word: UNDERRATED ! 

And I seriously ask me why... 

This game offers a lot of gameplay...AMAZING gameplay and also wonderful graphics. 

The sound isn't bad either... So, what could it be? 
That this game is a Battlezone rip-off? 
Oh, give me a break... 

Hum...maybe it's because the fog level is quite hard...no, that is not a (good) reason whatsoever...
